data.text: @Baconaut22 @NHastrosFan I never liked or defended lockdowns.  Now I didn’t go off the deep end but as a social species no way that was gonna go well
@Baconaut22 @quallsastros We learned a lot in two years though about what is right and at what time.
@NHastrosFan @quallsastros Just insanely frustrating to have John Hopkins come out 2 years later saying lockdowns are counterintuitive and can do more harm than good. 🙄
@Baconaut22 @quallsastros Also makes a difference if we're in the middle of a surge or not. As numbers come down common sense says we can back off restrictions.
@Baconaut22 @quallsastros Especially when here in WI, the 7 day death averages are double what they were 6 months ago. https://t.co/Bxbfvs2kUG
@Baconaut22 @quallsastros It’s crazy what all can change in 6 months and when you have an election coming up you need to win… https://t.co/PSlY1BVNGv
@OhGKenny13 I just saw the mask mandate just went away with the SOTU coming up.
